metadata.name: Pause
metadata.description:
Pluralize means 'to make plural' or 'express in the plural form' and is the name of The Burrow's NFT collection. The artworks within this collection aim to 'pluralize' the same idea or message (theme) through different genres of art, showcasing that the diversity of thought, process, and technique, can all come together to tell similar stories in their own unique way.

We celebrate our diversity through unity of expression.
